description: A collection of circles in a cylindrical formation with a rounded bottom; there is a small crescent-shaped formation extending outwards from the right side of the cylindrical formation and a small rectangular formation with a rounded top above the cylindrical formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a deep orange triangle in the center of the cylindrical formation and a dark red triangle at the top of the crescent-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
